title: Ticket #4861: List configuration knobs which must be in the base config file.
description: Some knobs -- ENABLE_IPV4 and ENABLE_IPv6 come to mind -- currently may not work quite right if they aren't in the base HTCondor config file. (NO_DNS and NETWORK_INTERFACE come to mind as other possibilities -- anything that changes $(HOSTNAME) or possibly $(IPADDRESS), or other macro(s) used to set the name of secondary config files.) We should document the list, probably in the admin manual's configuration section (or remove by fixing all the knobs on it).
